thread.title: ‘The Good Dinosaur’ Faces His Fear in Two New International Trailers
thread.title_full: ‘The Good Dinosaur’ Faces His Fear in Two New International Trailers

author: Kevin Melrose
title: ‘The Good Dinosaur’ Faces His Fear in Two New International Trailers
text:
‘The Good Dinosaur’ Faces His Fear in Two New International Trailers Thursday, October 8th, 2015 at 1:12pm PST Tweet 
Disney has released a pair of international trailers for “The Good Dinosaur,” revealing plenty of new footage from Pixar’s comedy-adventure. 
Directed by Peter Sohn from a story by Enrico Casarosa and Bob Peterson, “The Good Dinosaur” imagines an Earth where dinosaurs never became extinct. There, a lively young Apatosaurus named Arlo loses his father in a tragic accident, and sets out on an epic journey to find home, gaining as an unlikely companion a human boy he names Spot. 
Opening Nov. 25, “The Good Dinosaur” features the voice talents of Lucas Neff, Neil Patrick Harris, Bill Hader, John Lithgow, Frances McDormand and Judy Greer.
